structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
PUBLIC WORKS IN CITIES OTHER THAN THE FIRST CLASS

law.text: The legislative body may fix the compensation of the commissioners whose appointment they approve. The compensation of a commissioner shall not be decreased during the term to which he was appointed.
law.history: Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 303, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978. -- Created 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 287, sec. 6.
